snippet.title: Grave Official 2014 GDC Preview Trailer HD Version - Indie Survival Horror
snippet.description:
GRAVE IS NOW ON KICKSTARTER!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2129301589/grave-open-world-survival-horror

720p version of our first official trailer for Grave, an open-world survival horror experience. The game. The game is planned to release in 2015 and features dynamically changing worlds, light-based combat and a heavy emphasis on survival akin to classic survival horror titles.

WEBPAGE: http://www.grave-game.com/
FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/gravegame
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/gravegame
INDIEDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/grave

Subscribe for more videos and updates!
